register.not_match_pass: Confirm password does not match with password.

forgots.label1: Thank you! Please go to your inbox and you will find an email from Mountzoura!
forgots.label2: Your email is not associated with an active account.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.label1: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).
terms.label2: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old
terms.btn_dont: I don not agree with Terms & Conditions

kid_subscription.lbl_1: Your kid is a proud member of the online community of Mountzoura.
kid_subscription.lbl_2: You have limited access in Mountzoura by 1/5 from the whole content.
kid_subscription.lbl_4: You can change between kids profiles through this icon from the bottom menu.
kid_subscription.lbl_5: It's never too late! If you want your kid to have access in the whole content just subscribe here!
kid_subscription.lbl_6: You have access in the whole content.

quiz_result.title1: Try again, you can do better.
quiz_result.title2: Try again, you can do better.
quiz_result.desc1: Study the 'alphabet' again and play the game again.
quiz_result.desc2: Play the game again and raise your level, being careful not to repeat the same mistakes.
quiz_result.desc3: You did quite well. You need a little more study and you will definitely succeed in the next game.
quiz_result.desc4: Congratulations, you did great! You know the 'alphabet' very well. Continue to the next game to raise your level even more.
